title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: We are looking for an experienced frontend developer to join our team and help build next-generation web applications using React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies.
requirements: Strong proficiency in React and TypeScript
Experience with modern CSS and responsive design
responsibilities: Develop new features for our flagship product
Participate in code reviews and mentor junior developers
Collaborate with designers and product managers
Optimize application performance and user experience
Contribute to technical architecture decisions

title: Product Manager
description: Join our product team to help shape the future of our platform. We're looking for someone who can drive product strategy and work closely with engineering and design teams.
requirements: Technical background or ability to work closely with engineers
responsibilities: Define product roadmap and strategy
Write detailed product requirements documents
Work with engineering teams to ensure timely delivery
Conduct user research and market analysis
Manage product launches and go-to-market strategies

title: UX Designer
description: Creative UX designer needed for innovative product design. We're looking for someone passionate about user experience and creating intuitive, beautiful interfaces.
requirements: Proficiency in Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD
Experience with user research and usability testing
responsibilities: Conduct user research and create user personas
Design wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups
Develop and maintain design systems
Collaborate with developers to ensure design implementation
Conduct usability testing and iterate based on feedback

title: Backend Engineer
description: We're seeking a senior backend engineer to help build scalable cloud infrastructure and APIs that power millions of user experiences.
requirements: Strong proficiency in Python, Go, or Java
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)
Experience with databases and data modeling
responsibilities: Design and implement scalable backend services
Develop RESTful APIs and GraphQL endpoints
Optimize database performance and design
Ensure system reliability and monitoring
Mentor junior engineers and conduct code reviews

title: Data Analyst

category.name: Data & Analytics
category.description: Data analysis and data science roles

description: Join our data team to help drive business decisions through data analysis and visualization. Great opportunity for someone looking to grow their data career.
responsibilities: Analyze business data and generate insights
Create dashboards and reports for stakeholders
Collaborate with business teams to understand data needs
Identify trends and patterns in data
Present findings to non-technical audiences

title: DevOps Engineer
description: We're looking for a DevOps engineer to help build and maintain our cloud infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines.
requirements: 3+ years of DevOps or infrastructure experience
Knowledge of CI/CD tools and practices
Understanding of cloud security best practices
responsibilities: Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines
Manage cloud infrastructure and deployments
Implement monitoring and alerting systems
Automate manual processes and improve efficiency
Collaborate with development teams on deployment strategies

title: Mobile Developer
description: Mobile developer needed to create amazing user experiences on iOS and Android platforms using React Native or native technologies.
requirements: Proficiency in React Native or native iOS/Android development
responsibilities: Develop and maintain mobile applications
Collaborate with design team on UI implementation
Optimize app performance and user experience
Debug and fix mobile-specific issues
Participate in app store releases and updates

title: Marketing Manager
description: Marketing manager needed to drive growth and brand awareness through digital marketing campaigns and content strategy.
requirements: Understanding of SEO and content marketing
responsibilities: Develop and execute marketing campaigns
Manage content creation and distribution
Analyze marketing performance and ROI
Collaborate with sales team on lead generation
Manage marketing budget and vendors
